title: Quantum hypnosis, Mesmerism & Non-verbal Hypnotic Induction (1) / Dr. Marco Paret's masterclass
description:
This images are from the non-verbal hypnosis masterclass by Dr. Marco Paret. He used Fascination - the power of the gaze and Quantum hypnosis elements on one of his student. She entered in a deep trance of charm and couldn't stop following him, because she was magnetized by his gaze. What happens next? Find out in the next part of this video! To be continued. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
